alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 1:21PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 8 PM Wednesday to 11 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
